英文法規名稱: The Fee-Charging Standards for Application of Automatic Immigration Clearance System
中文法規名稱: 外來人口申請自動查驗通關系統收費標準
沿革內容: 1.Promulgated by National Immigration Agency, Ministry of the Interior by Order Tai-Nei-Yi No.10609540902 on October 30, 2017

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards are based on the Paragraph 1 of Article 10 of the Charges And Fees Act.

An alien who enter Taiwan area for temporary visit can apply Automatic Immigration Clearance System under the Treaty/Agreement, each application shall be charged 3,000 NTD and given 5 years of validity, with the exception of the principle of reciprocity may waive, deduct, or suspend the application fee.
An alien as defined foreign national, person of the Mainland area, or resident of Macau or Hong Kong.
Application which has been submitted is nonrefundable.
The Standards shall come into effect upon the day of promulgation.
